page.title: 07TRANSPORT:SCHOOL TAXI
page.content: {THE SCHOOL CHILDREN}FROM THE VILLAGES OF{NOTTINGTON & LANGTON HERRING}ARE TRANSPORTED DAILY BY THE BUS. THE BUS STARTS IN THE MORNING FROM{ {CHICKERELL}& DOES A CIRCULAR ROUTE THROUGH{NOTTINGTON LANE, BUCKLAND {RIPERS, TATTON FARM, LANGTON HERRING & ARRIVES AT{CHICKERELL SCHOOL}BY 08:55.AT 15:15 IT DOES THE RETURN JOURNEY. AT{BUCKLAND RIPERS}YOU HAVE TO BE AT THE PICK-UP POINT BY 08:15.WE USUALLY GET BACK TO{BUCKLAND RIPERS}AT 15:25.AT{TATTON FARM}YOU HAVE TO BE AT THE PICK-UP POINT AT 08:30. YOU USUALLY GET BACK AT 15:30.AT{LANGTON {HERRING}YOU HAVE TO BE AT THE PICK-UP POINT AT 08:35.YOU USUALLY GET BACK AT ABOUT 15:35 TO 15:40. THE{TAXIS}ARE{BLUEBIRD}AND ARE USUALLY DRIVEN BY{MR.T.HOARE.
